CustomField.description: Hidden field used by "Traded In Previous Month" flag
CustomField.formula:
IF(Current_Year__c,CASE(MONTH(TODAY()), /* Returns integer for current Month eg 1 = Jan */
1, Dec_Revenue_Amount__c, /* Assigns previous months Rev Amount eg 1 = Dec 2=Jan */ 2, Jan_Revenue_Amount__c, 3, Feb_Revenue_Amount__c, 4, Mar_Revenue_Amount__c, 5, Apr_Revenue_Amount__c, 6, May_Revenue_Amount__c, 7, Jun_Revenue_Amount__c, 8, Jul_Revenue_Amount__c, 9, Aug_Revenue_Amount__c, 10, Sep_Revenue_Amount__c, 11, Oct_Revenue_Amount__c, 12, Nov_Revenue_Amount__c, 0),0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field should be hidden. If seen, please contact your Salesforce Admiistrator.
CustomField.label: {hidden}Revenue In Previous Month
